msg: QPID-3603: Speed up qpid-ha-tool with fast QMF2 method calls.

msg: - Moved timer from  LinkRegistry to Link.
- Got rid of remapping code, simplified failover.
- Test for simple HA broker failover.

msg: QPID-3603: HA broker close backup link when promoted.

msg: - Flatten known-hosts in Link to a single URL.
- Allow setting a different retry URL.

msg: QPID-3603: Set known hosts at connection open in Link.
Formerly were being set during periodic maintenance.
